body:
What is the Avicus Podcast?
The Avicus Podcast is a show with your host {tag=0af038412894434ca4be965b317244e8}, {tag=c58188cb25d84d4497b111a598917f1b} and 1 other guest appearance. The Podcast will contain at least 1 hour of news, fun, banter & memes. 

Where is The Avicus Podcast going to be released?
It will be released on the Community Channel, which you can also conveniently find in this playlist. You can also get it on SoundCloud as well. Lastly, iTunes on the Podcast store is the last option too!
Usually, the Podcast will be live streamed on the Avicus Community YouTube Channel, here.

When will the Podcasts be released?
You will all be alerted as to when the podcast will be released on this forum topic.

So you were talking about Guest appearances... How do I come on the podcast as a guest appearance???
Well, you can fill out this form here... and follow the prompts and instructions that it gives you.

That's all for now... Have any questions comment below!

shadowolf365
My Channel
Community Channel

replies.body:
1. I don't particularly like TeamSpeak
2. I've tried recording on Avicus TeamSpeak before, but it doesn't work out without being interrupted all of the time with people coming in and out and getting spammed as well... I find it a problem for me.

replies.body: I am currently trying to set up a podcast as well but they will only be 10-15 minutes of information per episode. As someone who is also going into Radio to be a news director, I can tell you that shorter episodes compacted with a lot of information is 100% better than a 60 minute video with a little more information

replies.body:
Avicus Podcast will be going live tonight! 
The following are the times of when we are going live:
7pm AEDT
9pm NZDT
You can do the rest of the time conversions (it's basically in 1 hour)

We will be live on the Avicus Community YouTube channel which you can find linked here. If you're not subscribed to the community channel hit the subscribe button and go into settings and turn the bell on so you get a little notification for when the Avicus Community goes live!
